body: So.. every server is loading perfectly and I can join in almost 3 secs but Avicus isn't working and takes minutes for the server to kick in.. is this happening to you guys too? Please! Tell me :c
body_tagged: So.. every server is loading perfectly and I can join in almost 3 secs but Avicus isn't working and takes minutes for the server to kick in.. is this happening to you guys too? Please! Tell me :c
title: Help!

replies.body:
Yes, The server hubs are having an issue, however joining alt IPs work fine for me.

Btw I thought you left O_O

replies.body:
It works ^-^ Thanks :P

I was about to leave but I noticed I'm way too young to leave the video games and I noticed I couldn't leave this great server too x)

replies.body: Try using alternate IP's or Direct Connect to certain Servers like Nebula, Walls, and other Gamemodes, then you can /hub or do /server to another game. It works for me, but I don't know about other players.
